# Reactor Docket Search

The following table summarizes all ADAMS documents for the following dockets:

* `r nrcadams::docket_codex |> dplyr::pull(Project) |> cat(sep = "\n * ")`


```{r}
nrcadams::docket_codex |>
  dplyr::pull(Docket_Number) |>
  nrcadams::search_docket(days_back = 7) |>
  dplyr::mutate(Title = paste0("<a href='", URL, "'>", Title, '</a>')) |>
  dplyr::select(-URL) |>
  DT::datatable(
    caption = "The Last 7 Days of the nLWR Posted Licensing Documents.",
    filter = list(position = 'top', clear = TRUE, plain = FALSE),
    escape = FALSE
    )
```
